name: Othello
overview: "Rule is easy, but deep inside and everybody is addictive", "Othello" which is enjoyed all over the world appeared in Wii wear! You can compete against computers with alone, enjoy Othello match with 2 people, of course, you can enjoy free battle by connecting to Nintendo Wi - Fi connection. ◆ Othello alone by one person "Othello" can be played with the opponent against a computer with 10 levels of strength. ◆ Two people can enjoy two people Othello with one car. ◆ Connect to Othello Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection on Wi-Fi, you can enjoy communication battle with friends and strangers who are away from home. The result of the communication competition is recorded and grades and titles are obtained by grades. You can also compete against victory counts by registering competition results in ranking. Enjoy "Othello" as much as you want! For one person, two people, or for communication opponents! (Google Translated from Japanese WiiWare listing)
